data.text: Deɛ ɛfa Amonfoɔ ho no nie:
Nanso nna no reba,”
“Twa adwo Ao, Hesbon, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔasɛe Ai!
Adɛn enti na wode wo bɔnhwa ahodoɔ hoahoa wo ho?
Mede ehu bɛba wo so;
“Nanso, akyire no, mɛsane de Amonfoɔ adenya ama wɔn,”
Deɛ ɛfa Edom ho no nie:
Monnane mo ho na monnwane
Sɛ wɔn a wɔtete bobe no baa mo nkyɛn a
Na mɛma Esau ada adagya.
‘Monnya mo nwisiaa, na mɛbɔ wɔn nkwa ho ban.
Deɛ Awurade seɛ nie: “Sɛ wɔtwe wɔn a wɔmfata sɛ wɔtwe wɔn aso mpo a, ɛnneɛ adɛn enti na ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔtwe mo aso? Wɔbɛtwe mo aso!
Meka me ho ntam sɛ wɔbɛsɛe Bosra na ayɛ ahodwiredeɛ, ahohoradeɛ ne nnomedeɛ; na ne nkuro nyinaa bɛsɛe afebɔɔ,” Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Mate asɛm a ɛfiri Awurade nkyɛn:
“Na mɛyɛ wo ketewa wɔ amanaman no mu,
Ehu a wobɔ
“Edom bɛyɛ ahodwiredeɛ;
Sɛdeɛ wɔdanee Sodom ne Gomora
“Sɛdeɛ gyata firi Yordan nkyɛkyerɛ mu
Enti tie deɛ Awurade ahyehyɛ atia Edom,
Wɔn asehweɛ nnyegyeeɛ bɛma asase awoso;
Monhwɛ! Ɔkɔdeɛ bi bɛtu akɔ soro na wato hoo aba fam a
Deɛ ɛfa Damasko ho no nie:
Damasko ayɛ mmerɛ,
Adɛn enti na wɔnnyaa kuropɔn a agye din yi ntoo hɔ,
Ampa ara ne mmeranteɛ bɛhwehwe ase wɔ mmɔntene so;
“Mede ogya bɛto Damasko afasuo mu;
Deɛ ɛfa Kedar ne Hasor ahennie a Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar to hyɛɛ soɔ no nie.
Wɔbɛfa wɔn ntomadan ne wɔn nnwankuo;
“Monnwane nkɔ ntɛm ntɛm!
“Sɔre kɔto hyɛ ɔman bi so a woremmrɛ,
Wɔn mfunumu bɛyɛ afodeɛ,
“Hasor bɛdane sakraman atuo,
Yei ne asɛm a ɛfiri Awurade nkyɛn baa odiyifoɔ Yeremia hɔ a ɛfa Elam ho, wɔ Yudahene Sedekia adedie mfitiaseɛ:
Yei ne deɛ Asafo Awurade seɛ:
Mede mframa ɛnan no bɛba Elam so
Mɛbɔ Elam ahwete wɔ wɔn atamfoɔ anim,
Mɛsi mʼahennwa wɔ Elam
“Nanso, mɛsane de Elam adenya ama no
